Patterns v1.0.0-14

Side Navigation

  1. Details
  2. How to Apply

Source: src/components/side-navigation/side-navigation

The Side Navigation component is a sticky side menu that allows the users to jump to specific sections of content based on section titles.

<ol class="c-nav-list js-sticky js-section-set o-sticky-nav">
  <li class="c-nav-list__item"><a
      class="js-section c-nav-list__link bg-very-dark-blue border-very-dark-blue hover:border-strong-blue hover:bg-strong-blue"
      data-section="section-details" href="#section-details">Details<svg
        aria-hidden="true" class="icon--caret">
        <use xlink:href="#icon-caret-right"></use>
      </svg></a></li>
  <li class="c-nav-list__item"><a
      class="js-section c-nav-list__link bg-very-dark-blue border-very-dark-blue hover:border-strong-blue hover:bg-strong-blue"
      data-section="section-how-to-apple" href="#section-how-to-apple">How to
      Apply<svg aria-hidden="true" class="icon--caret">
        <use xlink:href="#icon-caret-right"></use>
      </svg></a></li>
</ol>
